short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make the KA programming window larger

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're coding for more than 10 minutes you'll realize how annoying the small window is, and wonder why the folks at KA didn't make a bigger text editor!

This chrome extension enlarges the text window used for writing code on the Khan Academy website. It 
also deletes all the superfluous elements that surround the text editor (header, footer, etc). 

~~~~~WARNING~~~~~: This extension is suuuper hacky and has many bugs! It is only intended for long coding sessions. You will have to disable the extension to restore site functionality!!!

Please review this app if it saves you more than 1 hour!!!!!



This is my debut chrome extension. If you want the source code for free comment below.

Enjoy,

Fletch
